{{relevant category|Developer versions}}
'''Developer builds''', in contrast to [[development versions]], are versions of ''[[Minecraft]]'' that are in the process of being developed, and are not intended to be publicly playable. Unlike development versions, developer builds seldom make it into the hands of non-[[Mojang Studios]] parties, and those that do are generally the result of leaks.
